biography.summary: Jon Ossoff is the junior United States Senator from Georgia, serving since January 20, 2021. A member of the Democratic Party, he focuses on infrastructure, national security, health care, and economic development.

contact.office_address: 317 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Supports expanding access to healthcare and protecting the Affordable Care Act.
Supports investments in infrastructure, innovation, and job creation.

bills_sponsored.title: Georgian Infrastructure Investment Act
bills_sponsored.summary: A comprehensive infrastructure package to modernize transportation and expand broadband access in Georgia.

timeline.event: Sworn in as U.S. Senator from Georgia.
Supported major votes on infrastructure and healthcare policy.

videos.title: Jon Ossoff speaks on the Senate floor
